src:
Sesi I
296 Saham Terjungkal, IHSG Ditutup Merah ke 6.135
07 Nov 2019, 05:16 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) ditutup negatif siang ini. IHSG turun 82 poin (1,3%) ke level 6.135.Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah siang ini berada di level Rp 14.023.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG naik 17 poin (0,27%) ke 6.234. Indeks LQ45 juga menguat 4 poin (0,41%) ke 992.Membuka perdagangan Kamis (7/11/2019), IHSG menguat 12 poin (0,21%) ke level 6.231. Indeks LQ45 juga naik 2,6 poin (0,27%) poin ke 990.Hingga sesi I berakhir, IHSG berbalik negatif dan turun cukup tajam hingga 82 poin (1,3%) ke level 6.135.Perdagangan saham ditransaksikan 365.587 kali dengan nilai Rp 3,6 triliun. Sebanyak 86 saham naik, 296 saham terjungkal dan 129 saham tak berubah.Sementara itu, bursa Amerika Serikat (AS) ditutup Bercampur. Dow Jones ditutup 27.492,56 (-0,00%), NASDAQ ditutup 8.410,63 (-0,29%), S&P 500 ditutup 3.076,77 (+0,07%). Bursa saham AS ditutup melemah tanpa banyak pergerakan.Investor masih cemas terhadap diskusi tentang AS-China yang belum ada realisasi hingga saat ini. AS-China masih belum menentukan lokasi pertemuan dan isi dari perjanjian fase 1 secara konkret.Investor menilai peningkatan saham dalam beberapa waktu lalu tidak akan bertahan lama tanpa adanya progres dari ekonomi yang benar-benar nyata. Bursa Asia dibuka melemah mengikuti pergerakan dari indeks saham AS. Investor masih menanti perkembangan dari AS-China terkait perang dagang. Saat ini belum ada sentimen lainnya yang mendorong indeks Asia.Bursa Asia siang ini mayoritas bergerak di zona merah, berikut pergerakannya:

Indeks Nikkei 225 turun 18 poin ke 23.285
Indeks Hang Seng turun 91 poin ke 27.597
Indeks Shanghai melemah 7 poin ke 2.971
Indeks Strait Times naik 1,7 poin ke 3.264


Simak Video "Dolar Tembus Rp 14.200 "

text:
Session I
296 Stocks Tumbled, JCI Closed Red to 6,135
Nov 07 2019, 05:16 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) closed negative this afternoon. The Jakarta Composite Index dropped 82 points (1.3%) to 6,135. The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this afternoon was at the level of Rp 14,023. In pre-trade, the Jakarta Composite Index rose 17 points (0.27%) to 6,234. The LQ45 index also rose 4 points (0.41%) to 992. Opening trading on Thursday (11/07/2019), the JCI gained 12 points (0.21%) to 6,231. The LQ45 index also rose 2.6 points (0.27%) to 990 points. Until the first session ended, the JCI turned negative and fell quite sharply to 82 points (1.3%) to the level of 6,135. Stock trading was traded 365,587 times with value Rp 3.6 trillion. A total of 86 shares rose, 296 shares tumbled and 129 shares remained unchanged. Meanwhile, the United States (US) exchanges closed mixed. Dow Jones closed 27,492.56 (-0.00%), NASDAQ closed 8,410.63 (-0.29%), S&P 500 closed 3,076.77 (+ 0.07%). US stock markets closed lower without much movement. Investors are still worried about discussions about the US-China which has not been realized until now. The US-China has not yet determined the location of the meeting and the contents of the phase 1 agreement concretely. Investors assess that the increase in shares in the past will not last long without the progress of a real economy. Asian markets opened lower following the movements of the US stock indexes. Investors are still waiting for developments from the US-China related to the trade war. At the moment there is no other sentiment that has pushed the Asian index. The majority of Asian bourses this afternoon are moving in the red zone, following their movements:

The Nikkei 225 index fell 18 points to 23,285
The Hang Seng Index fell 91 points to 27,597
The Shanghai index fell 7 points to 2,971
The Strait Times Index rose 1.7 points to 3,264


Check out the video "Dollar Penetrates Rp. 14,200"
